title: Welcome to JSON Schema!
page_source:
Welcome to the JSON schema tour! We're going to guide you through how to create a schema

Why would I want to create a schema? Schemas allow us to enforce some rules on the structure of a JSON file

View the next page to find out how!

title: Your first schema

data.nested-string: I'm a string in an object

page_source:
Have a look at the schema to the left:

This is what a sample schema looks like!

title: Validating against empty schemas

data.nested-string: I'm a string in an object

page_source:
The schema provided does not have any rules associated with it. This means a well formed JSON of any type will pass

Run the tests to see!
